translations: 恭维；称赞（compliment 的现在分词）

phrs.translation: 言不由衷(或挖苦人)的恭维话

sentences.sentence: Complimenting someone on their garment is also a great way to break the ice.
sentences.translation: 赞美别人的衣服也是打破沉默的好办法。

sentences.sentence: Grandpa was celebrating his 100th birthday, and everyone was complimenting him on how well he looked.
sentences.translation: 爷爷过一百岁生日，大家都祝贺他，说他看上去很健康。

sentences.sentence: Grandpa was celebrating his 100th birthday, and everyone was complimenting him on how healthy he looked.
sentences.translation: 爷爷过一百岁生日，大家都祝贺他，说他看起来很健康。
